tools.name: company_directory_find_email_address
tools.description: Finds all email addresses containing the given name (case-insensitive search).

name.description: Name or partial name to search for in email addresses

tools.name: email_get_email_information_by_id
tools.description: Retrieves specific details of an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email

field.description: Specific field to return. Available fields: 'email_id', 'inbox/outbox', 'sender/recipient', 'subject', 'sent_datetime', 'body'

tools.name: email_search_emails
tools.description: Searches for emails matching the given query across subject, body, or sender fields. The function matches an email if all words in the query appear in any of these fields.

query.description: Search query, matching terms in subject, body, or sender/recipient fields

date_min.description: Lower date limit for the email's sent date (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

date_max.description: Upper date limit for the email's sent date (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: email_send_email
tools.description: Sends an email to the specified recipient.

tools.name: email_delete_email
tools.description: Deletes an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be deleted

tools.name: email_forward_email
tools.description: Forwards an email to the specified recipient.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be forwarded

tools.name: email_reply_email
tools.description: Replies to an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be replied

tools.name: calendar_get_event_information_by_id
tools.description: Returns the event for a given ID.

field.description: Field to return. Available fields are: 'event_id', 'event_name', 'participant_email', 'event_start', 'duration'

tools.name: calendar_search_events
tools.description: Returns the events for a given query with pagination support.

query.description: Query to search for. Terms will be matched in the event_name and participant_email fields

time_min.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for an event's end time to filter by. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

time_max.description: Upper bound (inclusive) for an event's start time to filter by. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: calendar_create_event
tools.description: Creates a new event.

event_start.description: Start time of the event. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

duration.description: Duration of the event in minutes

tools.name: calendar_delete_event
tools.description: Deletes an event.

tools.name: calendar_update_event
tools.description: Updates an event.

field.description: Field to update. Available fields are: 'event_name', 'participant_email', 'event_start', 'duration'

tools.name: analytics_get_visitor_information_by_id
tools.description: Returns the analytics data for a given visitor ID.

tools.name: analytics_create_plot
tools.description: Plots the analytics data for a given time range and value.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

value_to_plot.description: Value to plot. Available values are: 'total_visits', 'session_duration_seconds', 'user_engaged', 'visits_direct', 'visits_referral', 'visits_search_engine', 'visits_social_media'

plot_type.description: Type of plot. Can be 'bar', 'line', 'scatter' or 'histogram'

tools.name: analytics_total_visits_count
tools.description: Returns the total number of visits within a specified time range.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: analytics_engaged_users_count
tools.description: Returns the number of engaged users within a specified time range.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: analytics_traffic_source_count
tools.description: Returns the number of visits from a specific traffic source within a specified time range.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

traffic_source.description: Traffic source to filter the visits. Available values are: 'direct', 'referral', 'search engine', 'social media'

tools.name: analytics_get_average_session_duration
tools.description: Returns the average session duration within a specified time range.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: project_management_get_task_information_by_id
tools.description: Returns the task information for a given ID.

field.description: Field to return. Available fields are: 'task_id', 'task_name', 'assigned_to_email', 'list_name', 'due_date', 'board'

tools.name: project_management_search_tasks
tools.description: Searches for tasks based on the given parameters.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the task

list_name.description: Name of the list the task belongs to

due_date.description: Due date of the task in YYYY-MM-DD format

board.description: Name of the board the task belongs to

tools.name: project_management_create_task
tools.description: Creates a new task.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the task

list_name.description: Name of the list the task belongs to. One of: 'Backlog', 'In Progress', 'In Review', 'Completed'

due_date.description: Due date of the task in YYYY-MM-DD format

board.description: Name of the board the task belongs to. One of: 'Back end', 'Front end', 'Design'

tools.name: project_management_delete_task
tools.description: Deletes a task by ID.

tools.name: project_management_update_task
tools.description: Updates a task by ID.

field.description: Field to update. Available fields are: 'task_name', 'assigned_to_email', 'list_name', 'due_date', 'board'

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_search_customers
tools.description: Searches for customers based on the given parameters with pagination support.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the customer

last_contact_date_min.description: Minimum last contact date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

last_contact_date_max.description: Maximum last contact date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

follow_up_by_min.description: Minimum follow up date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

follow_up_by_max.description: Maximum follow up date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_update_customer
tools.description: Updates a customer record by ID.

field.description: Field to update. Available fields are: 'customer_name', 'assigned_to_email', 'customer_email', 'customer_phone', 'last_contact_date', 'product_interest', 'status', 'notes', 'follow_up_by'

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_add_customer
tools.description: Adds a new customer record.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the customer

status.description: Current status of the customer. One of: 'Qualified', 'Won', 'Lost', 'Lead', 'Proposal'

last_contact_date.description: The last date the customer was contacted. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

product_interest.description: Product interest of the customer. One of: 'Software', 'Hardware', 'Services', 'Consulting', 'Training'

follow_up_by.description: Date for the next follow up. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_delete_customer
tools.description: Deletes a customer record by ID.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: analytics_traffic_source_count
tools.description: Returns the number of visits from a specific traffic source within a specified time range.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

traffic_source.description: Traffic source to filter the visits. Available values are: 'direct', 'referral', 'search engine', 'social media'

tools.name: analytics_get_average_session_duration
tools.description: Returns the average session duration within a specified time range.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: project_management_get_task_information_by_id
tools.description: Returns the task information for a given ID.

field.description: Field to return. Available fields are: 'task_id', 'task_name', 'assigned_to_email', 'list_name', 'due_date', 'board'

tools.name: project_management_search_tasks
tools.description: Searches for tasks based on the given parameters.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the task

list_name.description: Name of the list the task belongs to

due_date.description: Due date of the task in YYYY-MM-DD format

board.description: Name of the board the task belongs to

tools.name: project_management_create_task
tools.description: Creates a new task.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the task

list_name.description: Name of the list the task belongs to. One of: 'Backlog', 'In Progress', 'In Review', 'Completed'

due_date.description: Due date of the task in YYYY-MM-DD format

board.description: Name of the board the task belongs to. One of: 'Back end', 'Front end', 'Design'

tools.name: project_management_delete_task
tools.description: Deletes a task by ID.

tools.name: project_management_update_task
tools.description: Updates a task by ID.

field.description: Field to update. Available fields are: 'task_name', 'assigned_to_email', 'list_name', 'due_date', 'board'

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_search_customers
tools.description: Searches for customers based on the given parameters with pagination support.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the customer

last_contact_date_min.description: Minimum last contact date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

last_contact_date_max.description: Maximum last contact date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

follow_up_by_min.description: Minimum follow up date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

follow_up_by_max.description: Maximum follow up date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_update_customer
tools.description: Updates a customer record by ID.

field.description: Field to update. Available fields are: 'customer_name', 'assigned_to_email', 'customer_email', 'customer_phone', 'last_contact_date', 'product_interest', 'status', 'notes', 'follow_up_by'

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_add_customer
tools.description: Adds a new customer record.

assigned_to_email.description: Email address of the person assigned to the customer

status.description: Current status of the customer. One of: 'Qualified', 'Won', 'Lost', 'Lead', 'Proposal'

last_contact_date.description: The last date the customer was contacted. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

product_interest.description: Product interest of the customer. One of: 'Software', 'Hardware', 'Services', 'Consulting', 'Training'

follow_up_by.description: Date for the next follow up. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: customer_relationship_manager_delete_customer
tools.description: Deletes a customer record by ID.

input.content: Today's date is Thursday, 2023-11-30 and the current time is 23:59:00. Remember the current date and time when answering queries. Meetings must not start before 9am or end after 6pm.
Move all customers that haven't responded to a proposal for the hardware product in 4 weeks to lost in the crm

tools.name: company_directory_find_email_address
tools.description: Finds all email addresses containing the given name (case-insensitive search).

name.description: Name or partial name to search for in email addresses

tools.name: email_get_email_information_by_id
tools.description: Retrieves specific details of an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email

field.description: Specific field to return. Available fields: 'email_id', 'inbox/outbox', 'sender/recipient', 'subject', 'sent_datetime', 'body'

tools.name: email_search_emails
tools.description: Searches for emails matching the given query across subject, body, or sender fields. The function matches an email if all words in the query appear in any of these fields.

query.description: Search query, matching terms in subject, body, or sender/recipient fields

date_min.description: Lower date limit for the email's sent date (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

date_max.description: Upper date limit for the email's sent date (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: email_send_email
tools.description: Sends an email to the specified recipient.

tools.name: email_delete_email
tools.description: Deletes an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be deleted

tools.name: email_forward_email
tools.description: Forwards an email to the specified recipient.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be forwarded

tools.name: email_reply_email
tools.description: Replies to an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be replied

tools.name: calendar_get_event_information_by_id
tools.description: Returns the event for a given ID.

field.description: Field to return. Available fields are: 'event_id', 'event_name', 'participant_email', 'event_start', 'duration'

tools.name: calendar_search_events
tools.description: Returns the events for a given query with pagination support.

query.description: Query to search for. Terms will be matched in the event_name and participant_email fields

time_min.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for an event's end time to filter by. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

time_max.description: Upper bound (inclusive) for an event's start time to filter by. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: calendar_create_event
tools.description: Creates a new event.

event_start.description: Start time of the event. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

duration.description: Duration of the event in minutes

tools.name: calendar_delete_event
tools.description: Deletes an event.

tools.name: calendar_update_event
tools.description: Updates an event.

field.description: Field to update. Available fields are: 'event_name', 'participant_email', 'event_start', 'duration'

tools.name: analytics_get_visitor_information_by_id
tools.description: Returns the analytics data for a given visitor ID.

tools.name: analytics_create_plot
tools.description: Plots the analytics data for a given time range and value.

time_min.description: Start date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

time_max.description: End date of the time range. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD

value_to_plot.description: Value to plot. Available values are: 'total_visits', 'session_duration_seconds', 'user_engaged', 'visits_direct', 'visits_referral', 'visits_search_engine', 'visits_social_media'

plot_type.description: Type of plot. Can be 'bar', 'line', 'scatter' or 'histogram'
